PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-17472012-12-13,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA, 
ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectQuébec Sales Tax (chapter T-0.1) in Respect of Selected Listed Financial Institutions
PrecisOrder approving that the Minister of National Revenue, on behalf of the Government of Canada, enter into the Agreement WITH RESPECT TO THE ADMINISTRATION BY CANADA OF TITLE I OF AN ACT RESPECTING THE QUÉBEC SALES TAX (chapter T-0.1) in Respect of Selected Listed Financial Institutions, BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF CANADA AND THE GOVERNMENT OF QUEBEC.
AttachmentsAttachment
